bibl.title: Ptolemaic Mummy Stuffings, 2: a Comic Fragment and Grammatical Text in the Yale Collection (P.CtYBR inv. 5019, 5043).
bibl.note: Suite de: William A. Johnson, Ptolemaic Mummy Stuffings: An Intriguing Ptolemaic Scholar's Text in the Yale Collection (P.CtYBR 5018), ArchPF 62 (2016) pp. 1-19, 2 figg. n./bl. et coul. - P. Yale (P. CtYBR) Inv. 5019. Comedy. Late 3rd or early 2nd BC. - Inv. 5043. Grammatical commentary or notes (?). Late 3rd BC.
